aircraft.value: Hydra Advanced - AC-2567-473 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Pressure accumulator pre-charge loss. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 31/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 03/11/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 02/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 04/11/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 09/11/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Pressure accumulator pre-charge loss. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N2 - Defect Not Confirmed
